title: 各位的暑假都还剩多少
author: 神烦的白狗
txt_content: 我这边因为这个学期期末考的比较晚，暑假才开始一周不到，但有些朋友和我说他们快开学了，所以就想拿出来问一下，各位的暑假还剩多少，以及作业做完了吗

replies.author: piao_xue
replies.txt_content: 8.3放假，8.24开学，作业一笔没动（不动作业

replies.author: z841309249
replies.txt_content:
还有几天了!
我好慌

replies.author: qeq123
replies.txt_content: 还有一个月哈哈，气不气

replies.author: 抹茶sama
replies.txt_content: 我家里养了两条单身狗

replies.author: sauce_mai
replies.txt_content: 为何要讨论如此沉重的话题

replies.author: 执剑共舞华尔兹
replies.txt_content: 还有半个月，上学期期末考试没考，这学期开学直接考

replies.author: wishdsb
replies.txt_content: 半个多月吧，在家都待发霉了

replies.author: flacobob
replies.txt_content: 好像还有半个月

replies.author: qianxiaoxia
replies.txt_content: 20天左右吧

replies.author: Earfreet
replies.txt_content: 快结束了。

replies.author: FARCAE
replies.txt_content: 还有1个半月，这个暑假真长

replies.author: canglongbeta
replies.txt_content:
Earl_ 发表于 2020-8-11 13:55
快结束了。
我还有12天

replies.author: 色我也空
replies.txt_content: 表示今年就没上过几天学 后悔高中没好好读呢

replies.author: 天剑y
replies.txt_content: 不到一周就开学了，作业一字未动

replies.author: Huan★Pkl
replies.txt_content: 没有作业，暑假多短都没关系

replies.author: FFF_qming
replies.txt_content: 中考完，没作业

replies.author: angianen
replies.txt_content: 还剩一天都是赢家，以后上班就没寒暑假了

replies.author: zlptq.zzb
replies.txt_content: 2天后返校啊

replies.author: 甲甲
replies.txt_content: 暑假余额20天=-=
8.30日返校 上个月怎么过都不知道

replies.author: 一周茶饭
replies.txt_content: forever time

replies.author: cr030628
replies.txt_content: 还有8天了嘤嘤嘤

replies.author: 诡灬稽
replies.txt_content:
piao_xue 发表于 2020-8-11 13:30
8.3放假，8.24开学，作业一笔没动（不动作业
作业现在只做了数学

replies.author: 萧情
replies.txt_content: 没通知就无限期延续下去

replies.author: Ying_He_Ji
replies.txt_content: 还没开始写呢哈哈哈

replies.author: 天空的大楼
replies.txt_content: 我们这里还没有消息，这个要看我们大学什么时候开学

replies.author: 清迈双龙寺
replies.txt_content: 已经所剩无几了

replies.author: jiahao661683
replies.txt_content: 九月五开学= =，高三升大一没有作业嘿嘿

replies.author: ta很懒没留名字
replies.txt_content: 我还剩13天，9本作业全写完了

replies.author: 建哥哥
replies.txt_content: 不多了半个月

replies.author: 陈喵
replies.txt_content: 负（懂？

replies.author: yc90302
replies.txt_content: 还剩一个月多 大学推迟开学 还没作业 开心

replies.author: Qiezi_dada
replies.txt_content: 我估计还有俩月

replies.author: JNX
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 鸟之诗
replies.txt_content: 半个月吧

replies.author: 自省之人
replies.txt_content: 还有5天开学。。，假期差不多才半个月

replies.author: axltcs
replies.txt_content: 暑假余额已经不足，快开学了
